english: The Kayı tribe managed the Hanlı Bazaar very well.

Dündar became a bey (a title of respect). He decided to

text: Hanlı Pazar'ı satıp ağabeyin Sungur Tekin...
english: sell Hanlı Bazaar and unite our tribe with the tribes of his elder brother Sungur Tekin

text: Göçmeden evvel Hanlı Pazar'ı satmak için gitmiştir beyim.
english: My lord, he went to sell Hanlı Bazaar before he emigrated.
Son, go and save our market. Come quickly, my son
the jackals have swarmed in, finding the field empty.
Let it be known that the rule of jackals lasts only
until the wolf rises to its feet.
